nodes.text: The lost moon was a moon situated in the star system that contained the twin planets Eiram and E'ronoh. At some point in time, the moon had broken from its orbit and drifted between the two worlds, and the inhabitants of neither planet knew which it had originated from. As the moon was devoid of any value, Eiram and E'ronoh did not bother to fight over claiming it. A crisis broke out after members of the Directorate kidnapped rulers from both Eiram and E'ronoh, holding them in caves on the lost moon.
